metadata.name: Mad Meerkat Honorary: Gentle Bones (ETH)
metadata.description: Makers, Adventure, Daring - These values form the cornerstone for every Mad Meerkat, no matter the chain. It is a collection that represents a mutual recognition between certain individuals and the MM Project. Individuals, who we believe possess the MAD values in their life stories and likewise, would like to be part of our mad adventure. Real sees real. Introducing to you, our Mad Meerkat Honorary collection.
